Attributes.description: Ways in which the 'self' has been portrayed in eastern and western religious traditions. Thinkers to be considered include Aristotle, Mencius, Freud, Xunzi (Hsün-tzu), Nietzche, and Zhuangzi (Chuang-tzu).
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Tue Thu, Start Time: 9:30, End Time: 11:00, Building: Geography, Room: 212
